data.actual_result: 2nd mention resolves and shows that the user is mentioned
data.expected_result: 2nd mention shouldn't resolve as the user is not in the channel, like the 1st mention
data.short_description: Discord auto resolves mentions if user is pinged without discrim in a channel that they don't have access to.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a private channel that people don't have access to. - Find someone to test ping. - Try to ping with discrim included. ex. @turkey#1234 - May or may not work. - Now try without discrim. ex. @turkey
